translations: n.（Gardenia）人名；（英）加德尼亚，加德妮娅（女）

phrs.translation: 栀子属, 栀子花, 栀子, 栀子花及薄荷
加德尼亚, 意大利加德尼亚, 减德僧亚
橘子花开, 栀子花开, 何炅, 桅子花开

sentences.sentence: In fact, my mother wanted her children to see themselves much like the gardenia: lovely, strong and perfect.
sentences.translation: 事实上，我母亲希望她的孩子视自己为栀子花：可爱、强壮、完美。

sentences.sentence: Every year on my birthday, from the time I turned twelve, a bunch of white gardenia was delivered to my house.
sentences.translation: 自我十二岁起，每年我过生日时，都会有一束白色栀子花送到我家。

sentences.sentence: You will not find that type of gardenia.
sentences.translation: 你找不到那种栀子的了！
